extendedInfo.description: After many requests. Precious metal calculator for ios is now available for android. Pull live prices for Gold, Silver, Platinum, Palladium, and Rhodium from kitco the industry standard on metal prices. Each Metal has its own calculator to convert oz to grams penny wieght and more.You may hid the percent of spot that is entered, Which is useful when in front of customer.

reviews.comment: no b. s. app,  would be 5 star if it let us see a historical price graph of the featured metals\tgood stuff... change the title of your icon though \"scarpcalc\"?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good app. Attentive developer
reviews.comment: Very useful to figure out what jewelry is worth. Developer was helpful via email.

reviews.title: Nice and easy app for gold.
reviews.comment: Now I don\'t have to use my clunky spreadsheet anymore and can show customers right on my EVO the price.  Only thing it needs is silver down to .400 and .720 for buying old coins.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nice!! Best APP yet!!
reviews.comment: Seems to be just what the Dr. ordered!! Glad I found this app!! Icon says Scarp Calculator, please correct. Love it on my Home Page!! Simple to use!! Good job!! Wish it would refresh every 1-2 minutes.Thanks from... MMgoldguru!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love this app
reviews.comment: Looking forward to you adding coin weight and silver or gold value of the coins. That\'s the only reason I gave it a four instead of a five.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Works like a charm.
reviews.comment: Combined with a pocket sized gram scale you\'ll never overpay for scrap gold and silver when garage saling unless you want to.
